; Generated by the EDU-matic, created by Aradan for Norman Invasion
; Please visit http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?t=111344 for Aradan's Complete EDU Guide
; Free to use as long as this header is kept in place. Thank you.
; EDU for FATW, Generated: 2017-05-01 08:49

;==================================================
;== FOURTH AGE: TOTAL WAR - The Dominion of Men  ==
;==================================================

; Coded by Aradan 2008-2014 for The Dominion of Men together with EU and DMB files
; FA:TW EDU - Old Header now superceded by EDU Guide (see http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?t=111344)

; NOTES SPECIFIC TO FATW 3.0
; family-members assigned GUs must be listed before the faction's Recruitable GUs
; arrow2 should be used if the unit is to have flaming arrow ability : currently King's/Royal/City Longbowmen, Archers of Harad, Dorwinion Bowmen, Guards of the Haven, and Black Arrows
; orc_arrow is for Orkish archers; it is black and has less velocity (and a smaller radius to lessen damage)
; weapon sound "club" has been reserved to wargs as their animation is currently that of a horse
; weapon tech type "simple" = core (mannish non-cultic factions) / common (mannish cultic factions), trade-naval
; weapon tech type "blade" = non-cultic (mannish cultic factions) / non-mannish (non-mannish factions) / levy / assimilation
; weapon tech type "archery" = war-naval
; weapon tech type "siege" = cultic (mannish cultic factions) / mannish (non-mannish factions) / orkish
; weapon tech type "other" = bodyguard (non-RG) / peasant / mercenary / hobbit / divider
; all units are sea-faring with the exception of Oliphaunts
; all units currently take the is_peasant attribute
; levies possess 50% of the morale of their parent unit (rounded up)
; horde units' upkeep costs is 0.

; version notes

; 1.


;======================================================================================================================================================

;=========================
;== UNIT CATEGORY INDEX == (ctrl+f, search for "@id")
;=========================

;=======================================================================================
;
;		@08 HARONDOR
;
;=======================================================================================

; COMMENTS              Harondor Retainers / Noble / Bodyguard / Haradrian:Southron
;type                    harondor bodyguard
;dictionary              4a_harondor_bodyguard
;category                cavalry
;class                   skirmish
;voice_type              General_1
;soldier                 4a_harondor_bodyguard, 10, 0, 6.59
;officer                 4a_harad_bearer
;mount                   heavy horse
;mount_effect            horse +6, elephant +5, chariot +5
;attributes              sea_faring, hide_forest, frighten_foot, frighten_mounted, general_unit
;formation               1.8, 2.8, 3, 4.5, 4, square, wedge
;stat_health             1, 6
;stat_pri                7, 24, no, 0, 0, melee, other, piercing, spear, 50, 0.8
;stat_pri_attr           no
;stat_sec                12, 18, no, 0, 0, melee, other, slashing, sword, 25, 0.8
;stat_sec_attr           no
;stat_pri_armour         23, 7, 5, metal
;stat_sec_armour         0, 0, flesh
;stat_heat               5
;stat_ground             -1, 0, -5, -2

;formation               1, 1.2, 1.2, 1.4, 4, square
;stat_health             1, 5

;stat_sec                0, 0, no, 0, 0, melee, other, piercing, none, 25, 0.8

;stat_sec_armour         0, 0, flesh
;stat_heat               5
;stat_ground             2, -1, 2, -1
;stat_mental             12, disciplined, highly_trained
;stat_charge_dist        30
;stat_fire_delay         0
;stat_food               60, 300
;stat_cost               4, 1180, 180, 55, 300, 780

stat_pri_attr           no

stat_sec_attr           no
